## About

This deck was generated with **R Markdown** on **`r format(Sys.Date(), '%B %d, %Y')`**.  
It includes an interactive **Plotly** scatter plot using the built-in `iris` dataset.

## Interactive Plot (Plotly)

```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
# Ensure plotly is available and set a CRAN mirror if needed
if (!requireNamespace("plotly", quietly = TRUE)) {
  rep <- getOption("repos")
  if (is.null(rep) || length(rep) == 0 || isTRUE(rep["CRAN"] == "@CRAN@") || isTRUE(nchar(rep["CRAN"]) == 0)) {
    options(repos = c(CRAN = "https://cloud.r-project.org"))
  }
  install.packages("plotly")
}
library(plotly)

plot_ly(
  data  = iris,
  x     = ~Sepal.Length,
  y     = ~Petal.Length,
  color = ~Species,
  type  = "scatter",
  mode  = "markers"
) |>
  layout(
    title = "Iris: Sepal vs Petal Length",
    xaxis = list(title = "Sepal Length"),
    yaxis = list(title = "Petal Length")
  )
